nodes.text: The Guard Navy was the naval arm of the Mecetti House Guard. The fleet consisted of twelve capital ships, the majority of which were Victory II-class Star Destroyers. The Star Destroyers were bought from the Galactic Empire second-hand and refurbished at the Obulette shipyards. The rest o the fleet was comprisedof dozens of picket ships, corvettes, assault boats, and snubfighters.
